# cancelTracking()

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the menu and ends all menu tracking.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancelTracking()
```

## Handling Tracking

- **cancelTrackingWithoutAnimation()**: Dismisses the menu and ends all menu tracking without displaying the associated animation.

items.description: Dismisses the menu and ends all menu tracking without displaying the associated animation.
